author: Najja Parker
title: Super Bowl 2017: Falcons fans show off their best #DirtyBirdFace
text:
If you‚Äôve passed by someone covered in black and red paint, don‚Äôt be alarmed. It‚Äôs likely an Atlanta Falcons fan showing off their best #DirtyBirdFace for the Super Bowl .
With the biggest football event of the year just hours away, supporters are displaying their spirit with jerseys, caps, T-shirts and makeup.
Here are a few fans on social media showing off their best look.
#DirtyBirdFace Ready to Rise in Peachtree City! pic.twitter.com/3Ta5tqIK9W
